text:
Created attachment 26175
ssl_var_lookup_ssl_cert_verify improvement for FAILED

The attached patch produces better error messages for failed certificate validation for SSL_CLIENT_VERIFY. At least for us it mostly just produced FAILED:(null) before. Tested with httpd 2.2.14 and 2.2.16. Code in 2.3.8 seems still similar to 2.2.x.
creator: lat@iki.fi
